title: How to Login on Telegram on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open Telegram on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open Telegram on your iPhone or iPad. It’s the blue icon with a white paper airplane inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen. If you don’t have Telegram installed, you can download it free from the App Store.

steps.title: Tap Start Messaging.
steps.content: Tap Start Messaging . It’s at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Enter your phone number.
steps.content: Enter your phone number. Telegram will automatically fill in your country code. If the listed country is not correct, tap the arrow next to the country and select another from the list.

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen. Telegram will send an SMS message to the number you entered. You’ll have to enter this code on the next screen.

steps.title: Enter the code from Telegram.
steps.content: Enter the code from Telegram. You’ll have to open the text message from Telegram to find it. If you’ve used Telegram on a different phone or tablet connected to the same number, the code will initially be sent there. Tap Haven’t received the code? to get an SMS sent to the current phone or tablet with the number you’re using.

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen. You are now logged in to Telegram on this iPhone or iPad.
